parameters.name: SpinPeriod
parameters.description: SpinPeriod

parameters.name: Sector
parameters.description: SECTOR

parameters.name: Gain
parameters.description: Gain

parameters.name: ION_protons_COUNTS
parameters.description: ION_protons: counts per sector (spectrogram) with each sector being a sum from 4 spins; ION records only; the time given is the SECTOR midpoint in spin 2 out of 0,1,2,3

parameters.name: ION_protons_CPS
parameters.description: ---> ION_protons: counts per second per sector (spectrogram)

parameters.name: ION_protons_INTEN
parameters.description: ---> ION_protons: differential intensity per sector (spectrogram)

parameters.name: ION_protons_COUNTS_stack
parameters.description: ION_protons: counts per sector (stack_plot) with each sector being a sum from 4 spins; ION records only; the time given is the SECTOR midpoint in spin 2 out of 0,1,2,3

parameters.name: ION_protons_CPS_stack
parameters.description: ---> ION_protons: counts per second per sector (stack_plot)

parameters.name: ION_protons_INTEN_stack
parameters.description: ---> ION_protons: differential intensity per sector (stack_plot)

parameters.name: ION_protons_Edrift
parameters.description: Actual ION_protons channel midpoint energies at the middle of this day

parameters.name: ION_helium_COUNTS_stack
parameters.description: ION_helium:  counts per sector (stack_plot) with each sector being a sum from 4 spins; ION records only; the time given is the SECTOR midpoint in spin 2 out of 0,1,2,3

parameters.name: ION_helium_CPS_stack
parameters.description: ---> ION_helium: counts per second per sector (stack_plot)

parameters.name: ION_helium_INTEN_stack
parameters.description: ---> ION_helium: differential intensity per sector (stack_plot)

parameters.name: ION_helium_Edrift
parameters.description: Actual ION_helium channel midpoint energies at the middle of this day
